head.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Quickly extract specific pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} file using {{ProdFullName}} and save them as a separate document.

header.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: Enhance your {{EnvNameShort}} applications with {{ProdFullName}}, providing seamless page extraction for {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and images. It enables you to merge, split, extract, rearrange, and delete pages effortlessly.

more_features.title: Advanced document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a wide range of tools to manage over 50 popular business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, PowerPoint slides, Excel spreadsheets, images, and archives into a single document with flexible options.

feature_2.title: Manage document pages
feature_2.content: Easily reorder, move, or remove pages to structure your documents efficiently.

feature_3.title: Modify page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientation as needed.

feature_4.title: Extract selected pages
feature_4.content: Choose and extract only the pages you need, saving them as a new document.

formats.title: Extract pages from various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, making document management easy and efficient.

examples.comment_4: Save the extracted pages as a new file

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to extract pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Integrate seamless document processing into your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Specify the file path of the source {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Select the pages you want to extract.
content.step_4: Save the extracted pages as a new document.

code_1.title: Extract specific pages from a document
code_1.content: This example shows how to extract a selected range of pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} file and save them as a separate document.
code_1.comment_1: Specify the file path of the source document
code_1.comment_2: Set options to extract only even-numbered pages within a range
code_1.comment_4: Save the extracted pages as a new file
